properties.entry: -- 通过客户名称、房屋名称查询客户 SELECT c.* FROM main_customer c, mid_customer_house ch, main_house h WHERE c.id = ch.customerId AND ch.houseId = h.id AND c.isDeleted = 0 AND ch.isDeleted = 0 AND h.isDeleted = 0 AND c.fullName = ? AND h.NAME = ?
-- 查询客户法律纠纷信息 select * from dim_cust_specialidentity s where s.customerId = ? and s.isDeleted = 0 and s.identity = 8 and s.endDate > now() and s.beginDate < now()
